001    package tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces;
002    
003    import java.util.ArrayList;
004    import java.util.HashMap;
005    import android.app.Activity;
006    import android.view.SurfaceView;
007    import android.widget.FrameLayout;
008    
009    /**
010     * IAdContext is the main facade for ad requesting, should be created in each Activity that wants to display Ads.
011     */
012    public interface IAdContext {
013            
014            /**
015             *  Get constants look up table.
016             *  
017             *  @return an IConstants object
018             */
019            public IConstants getConstants();
020    
021            /**
022             * Set the video display.
023             * <br>
024             * Deprecated. Use {@link #registerVideoDisplayBase(FrameLayout)}registerVideoDisplayBase instead.
025             * <br>
026             *      <strong>Important Note: please put the SurfaceView in a <em>FrameLayout</em>,
027             *              only <em>FrameLayout</em> container is supported currently.</strong>
028             * @param videoDisplay the SurfaceView which resides in a FrameLayout
029             */
030            @Deprecated
031            public void registerVideoDisplay(SurfaceView videoDisplay);
032    
033            /**
034             *      Set the FrameLayout on which the temporal ads will be drawn.
035             *      <br>
036             *      AdManager will use it to find where to play the temporal ads.
037             *      Video ads will fill the FrameLayout and overlay ads will be put at a certain position of the FrameLayout.
038             *  <br>
039             *      
040             *      @param videoDisplayBase the FrameLayout on which the temporal ads will be drawn
041             */
042            public void registerVideoDisplayBase(FrameLayout videoDisplayBase);
043    
044            /**
045             *  Reset the exclusivity scope. <br>
046             */
047            public void resetExclusivity();
048            
049            /**
050             *      Start a new subsession with subsession token.
051             *
052             *      Following requests will be in the subsession, until this method is called again with a different token.
053             *      It will turn on FW_CAPABILITY_SYNC_MULTI_REQUESTS capability.
054             *
055             *      @param subsessionToken  a positive int value to identify the subsession
056             */      
057            public void startSubsession(int subsessionToken);       
058            
059            /**
060             *  Set the Activity object which create this adContext. <br>
061             *  An Ad Context should be attached to an Activity.
062         *
063             *  @param activity the Activity this IAdContext is attached to
064             */
065            public void setActivity(Activity activity);
066            
067            /**
068             *      Return application's current Activity which create and hold the reference of this AdContext.
069             *
070             *      @return the Activity object
071             */
072            public Activity getActivity();
073            
074            /**
075             *  Should be invoked when the Activity's state change.
076             */
077            public void setActivityState(int state);
078            
079            /**
080             *      Set the video play state.
081             *
082             *      @param  videoState the type of the state, the value should be one of:
083             *              <br>
084             *              <br>      VIDEO_STATE_PLAYING
085             *              <br>      VIDEO_STATE_PAUSED
086             *              <br>      VIDEO_STATE_STOPPED
087             *              <br>      VIDEO_STATE_COMPLETED
088             */
089            public void setVideoState(int videoState);
090            
091            /**
092             *      Set the parameters for a special level.
093             *      
094             *      @param name key of the parameter to be set
095             *      @param value value for the key
096             *  @param level level of the parameters, must be one of:
097             *      <br>
098             *      <br> PARAMETER_LEVEL_GLOBAL
099             *      <br> PARAMETER_LEVEL_OVERRIDE
100             */
101            public void setParameter(String name, Object value, int level);
102            
103            /**
104             *  Set the profiles which describes the player and slots.
105             *
106             *  @param  playerProfile                   name of the global profile
107             *  @param  defaultTemporalSlotProfile      name of the temporal slot default profile, null for default
108             *  @param  defaultVideoPlayerSlotProfile   name of the video player slot default profile, null for default
109             *  @param  defaultSiteSectionSlotProfile   name of the site section slot default profile, null for default
110             */
111            public void setProfile(String playerProfile, String defaultTemporalSlotProfile, 
112                            String defaultVideoPlayerSlotProfile, String defaultSiteSectionSlotProfile);
113            
114            /**
115             *  Set the attributes of the visitor.
116             *
117             *  @param  customId        custom id of the visitor
118             *  @param  ipV4Address     ip address of the visitor
119             *  @param  bandwidth       bandwidth of the visitor
120             *  @param  bandwidthSource bandwidth source of the visitor
121             */
122            public void setVisitor(String customId, String ipV4Address, 
123                                                            int bandwidth, String bandwidthSource);
124            
125            /**
126             *  Set the HTTP headers of the visitor.
127             *
128             *  @param  name    name of the header to be set
129             *  @param  value   value of the header to be set, null to remove
130             */
131            public void setVisitorHttpHeader(String name, String value);
132            
133            /**
134             *  Set the capabilities supported by the player.
135             *
136             *  @param  capability name of the capability, should be one of:
137             *      <br>
138             *      <br>CAPABILITY_SLOT_TEMPLATE, ON by default
139             *      <br>CAPABILITY_ADUNIT_IN_MULTIPLE_SLOTS, ON by default
140             *      <br>CAPABILITY_SLOT_CALLBACK, ON by default
141             *      <br>CAPABILITY_BYPASS_COMMERCIAL_RATIO_RESTRICTION
142             *      <br>CAPABILITY_SYNC_MULTI_REQUESTS
143             *      <br>CAPABILITY_RESET_EXCLUSIVITY
144             *      <br>CAPABILITY_RECORD_VIDEO_VIEW
145             *      <br>
146             *  
147             *  @param  status the status be set, should be one of:
148             *      <br>
149             *      <br>CAPABILITY_STATUS_ON
150             *      <br>CAPABILITY_STATUS_OFF
151             *      <br>CAPABILITY_STATUS_DEFAULT
152             *      <br>
153             *
154             *  Note: <br>
155             *  Changing renderer capability after renderer starts playing may result undefined behaviour.
156             */
157            public void setCapability(String capability, int status);
158            
159            /**
160             *  Set the attributes of the site section.
161             *
162             *  @param  siteSectionId   id of the site section
163             *  @param  pageViewRandom  unique id for current playing
164             *  @param  networkId       id of the network the site section belongs to, 0 for default
165             *  @param  idType          type of the id above, should be one of
166             *                                                      <br>
167             *                              <br> ID_TYPE_CUSTOM
168             *                              <br> ID_TYPE_FW
169             *                              <br> ID_TYPE_FWGROUP
170             *  @param  fallbackId      site section id to fallback, if id specified by the 1st parameter is not found, 0 for default
171             */
172            public void setSiteSection(String siteSectionId, int pageViewRandom, int networkId, 
173                                                                    int idType, int fallbackId);
174            
175        /**
176         *  Set the attributes of the video player.
177         *  
178         *  @param videoPlayerNetworkId  id of the network the player belongs to
179         */
180            public void setVideoPlayer(int videoPlayerNetworkId);
181            
182            /**
183             *  Set the attributes of current video asset to play.
184             *
185             *  @param  videoAssetId    id of the video
186             *  @param  duration        duration of the video in seconds
187             *  @param  location        location of the video, null for default
188             *  @param  autoPlay        whether the video begins to play automatically without user interaction
189             *  @param  videoPlayRandom random number that is generated each time a user watches this video asset
190             *  @param  networkId       id of the network the video belongs to, 0 for default
191             *  @param  idType          type of video id above, should be one of:
192             *                                                      <br>
193             *                              <br> ID_TYPE_CUSTOM
194             *                              <br> ID_TYPE_FW
195             *                              <br> ID_TYPE_FWGROUP
196             *  @param  fallbackId      video id to fallback, if id specified by the 1st parameter is not found, 0 for default
197             */
198            public void setVideoAsset(String videoAssetId, double duration, 
199                            String location, boolean autoPlay, int videoPlayRandom, 
200                            int networkId, int idType, int fallbackId);
201            
202            /**
203             *  Set the attributes of current video asset to play.
204             *
205             *  @param  videoAssetId    id of the video
206             *  @param  duration        duration of the video in seconds
207             *  @param  location        location of the video, null for default
208             *  @param  autoPlayType        auto play mode, includes:
209             *                                              <ul><li> VIDEO_ASSET_AUTO_PLAY_TYPE_NONE
210             *                                                      <li> VIDEO_ASSET_AUTO_PLAY_TYPE_ATTENDED
211             *                                                      <li> VIDEO_ASSET_AUTO_PLAY_TYPE_UNATTENDED</ul>
212             *                                                      <br>
213             *  @param  videoPlayRandom random number that is generated each time a user watches this video asset.
214             *  @param  networkId       id of the network the video belongs to, 0 for default
215             *  @param  idType          type of video id above, includes:
216             *                          <ul><li> ID_TYPE_CUSTOM
217             *                              <li> ID_TYPE_FW
218             *                              <li> ID_TYPE_FWGROUP</ul>
219             *                                                      <br>
220             *  @param  fallbackId      video id to fallback, if id specified by the 1st parameter is not found, 0 for default
221             *  @param  durationType    type of duration of asset, includes
222             *                                              <ul><li> VIDEO_ASSET_DURATION_TYPE_EXACT
223             *                                                      <li> VIDEO_ASSET_DURATION_TYPE_VARIABLE</ul>
224             *                                                      <br> 
225             */
226            public void setVideoAsset(String videoAssetId, double duration, 
227                            String location, int autoPlayType, int videoPlayRandom, 
228                            int networkId, int idType, int fallbackId, int durationType);
229            
230            /**
231             * Set time position of video asset.
232             *
233             * If the stream is broken into multiple distinct files, this should be the time position within the asset as a whole.
234             *
235             * @param timePosition  a non-negative number in seconds indicate the time position of video asset  
236             */
237            public void setVideoAssetCurrentTimePosition(double timePosition);
238            
239            /**
240             * Set the mode of request.
241             *
242             *              AdManager runs in On-Demand mode by default.
243             *              To switch to live mode by invocation of this method right after getting a new AdContext instance.
244             *
245             * @param requestMode   the type of request mode
246             *                                              <br>
247             *                                              <br> REQUEST_MODE_ON_DEMAND
248             *                                              <br> REQUEST_MODE_LIVE  
249             */
250            public void setRequestMode(int requestMode);
251            
252            /**
253             * Set duration of request in live mode.
254             *
255             * @param requestDuration       the value of duration in seconds
256             */
257            public void setRequestDuration(double requestDuration);
258    
259            /**
260             *  Add the key-value pair, if add different values with the same key, they will both the values for the key.
261             *
262             *  @param  key     key name of the key-value pair to be set, null or empty string will no effect
263             *  @param  value   value to be set, null has no effect
264             */
265            public void addKeyValue(String key, String value);
266            
267            /**
268             *  Add a temporal slot.
269             *
270             *  @param  customId                    custom id of the slot, add a slot with an identical name as existing slot will be ignored
271             *  @param  adUnit                      ad unit supported by the slot
272             *  @param  timePosition                time position of the slot
273             *  @param  slotProfile                 profile name of the slot, null for default
274             *  @param  cuePointSequence            sequence of the cuePoint of the slot
275             *  @param  maxDuration                 maximum duration of the slot allowed, 0 for default
276             *  @param  acceptPrimaryContentType    accepted primary content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
277             *  @param  acceptContentType           accepted content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
278             *  @param  minDuration                 minimum duration of the slot allowed, 0 for default
279             */
280            public void addTemporalSlot(String customId, String adUnit, 
281                            double timePosition, String slotProfile, int cuePointSequence, 
282                            double maxDuration, String acceptPrimaryContentType, 
283                            String acceptContentType, double minDuration);
284            
285            /**
286             *  Add a video player non-temporal slot.
287             *  
288             *  @param  customId                    custom id of the slot, add a slot with an identical name as existing slot will be ignored
289             *  @param  adUnit                      ad unit supported by the slot
290             *  @param  width                       width of the slot in device-independent pixels
291             *  @param  height                      height of the slot in device-independent pixels
292             *  @param  slotProfile                 profile name of the slot, null for default
293             *  @param  acceptCompanion             whether to accept companion ads on this slots
294             *  @param  acceptPrimaryContentType    accepted primary content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
295             *  @param  acceptContentType           accepted content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
296             */
297            public void addVideoPlayerNonTemporalSlot(String customId, String adUnit, int width, int height, 
298                            String slotProfile, boolean acceptCompanion, 
299                            String acceptPrimaryContentType, String acceptContentType);
300            
301            /**
302             *  Add a video player non-temporal slot.
303             *  
304             *  @param  customId                    custom id of the slot, add a slot with an identical name as existing slot will be ignored
305             *  @param  adUnit                      ad unit supported by the slot
306             *  @param  width                       width of the slot in device-independent pixels
307             *  @param  height                      height of the slot in device-independent pixels
308             *  @param  slotProfile                 profile name of the slot, null for default
309             *  @param  acceptCompanion             whether to accept companion ads on this slots
310             *  @param  acceptPrimaryContentType    accepted primary content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
311             *  @param  acceptContentType           accepted content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
312             *  @param  initialAdOption                             choice of the initial ad of this slot, should be one of
313             *              <br>
314             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_STAND_ALONE
315             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_KEEP_ORIGINAL
316             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_ONLY
317             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_STAND_ALONE
318             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_THEN_STAND_ALONE
319             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_NO_STAND_ALONE
320             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_NO_STAND_ALONE
321             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_NO_STAND_ALONE_IF_TEMPORAL
322             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_NO_STAND_ALONE_IF_TEMPORAL
323             *  @param  compatibleDimensions                compatible dimensions in form of "width,height|width,height", such as ""320,240|480,720"
324             */
325            public void addVideoPlayerNonTemporalSlot(String customId, String adUnit, int width, int height, 
326                            String slotProfile, boolean acceptCompanion, 
327                            String acceptPrimaryContentType, String acceptContentType,
328                            int initialAdOption, String compatibleDimensions);
329            
330            /**
331             *  Add a site section non-temporal slot.
332             *
333             *  @param  customId                    custom id of the slot, adding a slot with an identical name as existing slot will be ignored
334             *  @param  adUnit                      ad unit supported by the slot
335             *  @param  width                       width of the slot in device-independent pixels
336             *  @param  height                      height of the slot in device-independent pixels
337             *  @param  slotProfile                 profile name of the slot, null for default
338             *  @param  acceptCompanion             whether to accept companion ads on this slots
339             *  @param  acceptPrimaryContentType    accepted primary content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
340             *  @param  acceptContentType           accepted content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
341             *  @param  initialAdOption                             choice of the initial ad of this slot, should be one of
342             *              <br>
343             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_STAND_ALONE
344             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_KEEP_ORIGINAL
345             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_ONLY
346             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_STAND_ALONE
347             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_THEN_STAND_ALONE
348             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_NO_STAND_ALONE
349             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_NO_STAND_ALONE
350             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_NO_STAND_ALONE_IF_TEMPORAL
351             *              <br> SLOT_OPTION_INITIAL_AD_FIRST_COMPANION_OR_NO_STAND_ALONE_IF_TEMPORAL
352             *  @param  compatibleDimensions                compatible dimensions in form of "width,height|width,height", such as ""320,240|480,720"
353             */
354            public void addSiteSectionNonTemporalSlot(String customId, String adUnit, int width, int height, 
355                            String slotProfile, boolean acceptCompanion, 
356                            String acceptPrimaryContentType, String acceptContentType,
357                            int initialAdOption, String compatibleDimensions);
358            
359            /**
360             *  Add a site section non-temporal slot.
361             *
362             *  @param  customId                    custom id of the slot, adding a slot with an identical name as existing slot will be ignored
363             *  @param  adUnit                      ad unit supported by the slot
364             *  @param  width                       width of the slot in device-independent pixels
365             *  @param  height                      height of the slot in device-independent pixels
366             *  @param  slotProfile                 profile name of the slot, null for default
367             *  @param  acceptCompanion             whether to accept companion ads on this slots
368             *  @param  acceptPrimaryContentType    accepted primary content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
369             *  @param  acceptContentType           accepted content types, use "," as delimiter, null for default
370             */
371            public void addSiteSectionNonTemporalSlot(String customId, String adUnit, int width, int height, 
372                            String slotProfile, boolean acceptCompanion, 
373                            String acceptPrimaryContentType, String acceptContentType);
374            
375            /**
376             *      Get a slots by its customId.
377             *      
378             *      @param customId custom id of the slot
379             *      @return an ISlot object, or null if not found
380             */
381            public ISlot getSlotByCustomId(String customId);
382            
383            /**
384             *      Get all slots by its timePositionClass.
385             *      
386             *      @param timePositionClass the value should be one of:
387             *              <br>
388             *              <br> TIME_POSITION_CLASS_PREROLL
389             *              <br> TIME_POSITION_CLASS_MIDROLL
390             *              <br> TIME_POSITION_CLASS_POSTROLL
391             *              <br> TIME_POSITION_CLASS_OVERLAY
392             *              <br> TIME_POSITION_CLASS_DISPLAY
393             *          <br> TIME_POSITION_CLASS_PAUSE_MIDROLL
394             *      @return an Array of ISlot object, will return an empty array if none found
395             */
396            public ArrayList<ISlot> getSlotsByTimePositionClass(int timePositionClass);
397            
398            /**
399             *      Get all the temporal slots.
400             *
401             *      @return an Array of ISlot object, will return an empty array if none found
402             */
403            public ArrayList<ISlot> getTemporalSlots();
404            
405            /**
406             *      Get all the video player non-temporal slots.
407             *
408             *      @return an Array of ISlot object, will return an empty array if none found
409             */
410            public ArrayList<ISlot> getVideoPlayerNonTemporalSlots();
411            
412            /**
413             *      Get all the site section non-temporal slots.
414             *
415             *      @return an Array of ISlot object, will return an empty array if none found
416             */
417            public ArrayList<ISlot> getSiteSectionNonTemporalSlots();
418            
419            /**
420         *  Submit the request to FreeWheel Ad Server.
421             *
422         *  Each AdContext can only submitRequest once.
423         *  
424         *  @param timeoutSeconds timeout time in seconds for this request
425         */
426            public void submitRequest(double timeoutSeconds);
427            
428            public void addRenderer(String url, String baseUnit, String adUnit, String contentType, String slotType, HashMap<String, Object> parameters);
429            
430            public void addRenderer(String url, String baseUnit, String adUnit, String contentType, String slotType, String creativeAPI, HashMap<String, Object> parameters);
431            
432            /**
433             * Register an event listener.
434             *
435             * @param type name of the event to listen to
436             * @param listener the listener
437             */
438            public void addEventListener(String type, IEventListener listener);
439            
440            
441            /**
442             * Remove an event listener.
443             *
444             * @param type the name of the event to listen to
445             * @param listener the listener
446             */
447            public void removeEventListener(String type, IEventListener listener);
448            
449            public void dispatchEvent(IEvent event);
450            
451            /**
452             * Dispose this AdContext object and remove all event listeners of it, stop all playing slots.
453             * <br>
454             * After this call, all other methods should not be invoked in this adContext.
455             */
456            public void dispose();
457            
458            /**
459             *      Get video asset's url location.
460             *
461             *      @return a String set by API setVideoAsset's location parameter, or null if not set
462             */
463            public String getVideoLocation();
464            
465            /**
466             *      Retrieve a parameter.
467             *
468             *  @param  name name of the parameter need to retrieve
469             */
470            public Object getParameter(String name);
471            
472            /**
473             *  Get the AdManager object which create the current AdContext.
474             *
475             *  @return an IAdManager object
476             */
477            public IAdManager getAdManager();
478            
479            /**
480             *      Get the mode of ad request.
481             *
482             *      @return A int value set by API setRequestMode , possible value is:
483             *                                              <br> REQUEST_MODE_ON_DEMAND
484             *                                              <br> REQUEST_MODE_LIVE 
485             *                      <br> default value is REQUEST_MODE_ON_DEMAND
486             */
487            public int getRequestMode();
488            
489            /**
490             *      Set the user actions.
491             *
492             *      @param userAction The value should be one of:
493             *                                              <br> USER_ACTION_PAUSE_BUTTON_CLICKED
494             *                                              <br> USER_ACTION_RESUME_BUTTON_CLICKED
495             */
496            public void notifyUserAction(int userAction);
497            
498            /**
499             *      Load player extension from given URL which implements IExtension.
500             *
501             *      <br>Event IConstants.EVENT_EXTENSION_LOADED will be fired when an extension succeeds or fails to initialize.
502             *      
503             *      @param name a String identifier of the extension
504             */
505            public void loadExtension(String name);
506    }
